H0.text: In a poll conducted in the early 1970's who was voted the most hated man in history. Napoleon Bonaparte

H1.text: In a poll conducted in the early 1970's who was voted the most hated man in history. Joseph Stalin

H2.text: In a poll conducted in the early 1970's who was voted the most hated man in history. King Leopold II of Belgium

H3.text: In a poll conducted in the early 1970's who was voted the most hated man in history. Hitlar

A4.text: Under Hitler's leadership and racist ideology, the Nazi regime was responsible for the genocide of an estimated six million Jews and millions of other victims

A5.text: The historian and biographer Ian Kershaw described Hitler as 'the embodiment of modern political evil'.
